page.title: 04LADY DIXON PARK
page.content: Lady Dixon Park is situated on the Upper Malone Road, Belfast.It has been open to the public since 1959 and covers 128 acres of land.It has a lot of wide open space,ideal for having a relaxing time.The Park has a very good playground for children.There are swings,slides,roundabouts,a climbing frame and a super slide. Also in the Park is Wilmont House that was once occupied by the Dixons but is now an old people's home.Wilmont House has a false window which has been painted on the brick work. Once a year there are rose trials in Lady Dixon Park.The rose beds cover 11 acres of the park.Among the 20,000 roses on show are some new types that will later become well known throughout the world.
